column5: I caught a nice 3lb trout and decided to keep it for the table..Anyone got a simple way to make it?
Cut into steaks, add some butter to a hot pan, and sprinkle with Lemon Pepper seasoning.  Nothing could be more simple.  G
Fillet, skin, remove lateral line and bones then stuff the left overs in the recycling bin (garbage). Pan fried with a little lemon pepper is the best IMO.
Debone,butterfly and cover with lemon butter.Wrap in foil and toss on the grill for a few minutes.Sort of poach them in foil.MMMM good eats. Joe
cube the meat and deep fry in fish crisp (beer batter)...stuff the rest under the drivers seat of someone your not fond of ...

if you like to fry fish i'd do it in butter, medium heat, rolled in flour, sprinkled with salt and pepper....lemon juice at the end...   in the oven i like to smear it with mayo, top with dill and lemon and bake for 20 minutes.
